title: Star Cloak
summaries: The Star Cloak is a Hardmode accessory that causes three stars to fall around the player whenever the player takes damage. It consumes no mana. The stars pass through blocks until reaching the player's altitude, at which point they continue falling until hitting blocks. They pierce through an unlimited number of enemies. The Star Cloak has a (Desktop, Console, Mobile and 3DS versions) 16.67*1/6 (16.67%) / (Old-gen console version) 14.29*1/7 (14.29%) chance to be dropped by Mimics.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, the stars deal 75 / <linked>150</linked> / <linked>225</linked> damage which is not classified as any of the four <linked>damage types</linked> and therefore cannot be modified by any <linked>buffs</linked> or equipment. Furthermore, the stars have 25 <linked>armor penetration</linked>.

On the <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console version</linked> and <linked>Nintendo 3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked><linked> version</linked>, the stars deal 30 <linked>magic damage</linked>.
